3.1.0.name: lie
3.1.0.description: A basic but performant promise implementation

scripts.build-node: copyfiles -f src/index.js lib && browserify-transform-cli inline-process-browser unreachable-branch-transform es3ify < src/index.js > lib/browser.js
scripts.build-poly: npm run build-poly-js && npm run build-poly-min
scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-js && npm run build-min && npm run build-poly
scripts.prebuild: rimraf lib dist && mkdirp lib dist
